name: HaMP
description:
Hangman meets platformer

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0 (failure is progress)

Gamemodes:
    Random (Casual) mode: Guess a random word
    Speedrun mode: Make the word "WOWIE" as fast as possible.
        My personal record: 1:24, please post your times below!

Controls:
    Move: arrows, WASD or Gamepad left stick
    Jump: arrow up, w, spacebar or GamePad button south
    Dash: left shift or GamePad button east

GRAB THE SPAWNING BITS (GREEN 0 AND 1), IF YOU HAVE 8 THEY WILL REVEAL A CHARACTER!

Context:

    You are a hacker and try to use the terminal to do a brute force attack and get someone's password.

    Hack the password by jumping on characters to change them, but don't get caught by the cursors.
    Or do die, since it will reveal if you were correct with the last alteration.
    Collect bits of information to be able to brute force a character and get it correct.

    There only is 11 million possibilities. No matter how you do it, every attempt will get you closer.

    There also is a speedrun mode where the word is always the same (WOWIE).
    My personal best time is 1:24, with exactly 1 minute playtime and 24 seconds punishment.
    I look forward to seeing what kind of exploits u can come up with ;)

For optimal experience playing with a controller is recommended.
This allows for dashing in any direction.
